meanings.definition: The state or quality of being limited.
meanings.sent1: The limitednesses of the small room made it feel cramped.
meanings.sent2: The limitednesses of the budget forced us to cut back on expenses.
meanings.sent3: The limitednesses of the cookie jar led to a comical struggle to fit more cookies inside.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared high, unaware of the limitednesses of reality waiting to bring her down.
meanings.sent5: The limitednesses of time made it impossible to finish all the tasks.

meanings.definition: The condition of having restrictions or constraints.
meanings.sent1: The limitednesses of the rules made it challenging to innovate.
meanings.sent2: The limitednesses of the contract prevented us from making any changes.
meanings.sent3: The limitednesses of the traffic light caused a humorous dance of cars stopping and going.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean, the limitednesses of the fish tank seemed suffocating.
meanings.sent5: The limitednesses of the fence kept the dog from exploring beyond the yard.

meanings.definition: The extent to which something is restricted or confined.
meanings.sent1: The limitednesses of the box made it impossible to fit all the items inside.
meanings.sent2: The limitednesses of the parking space forced us to find an alternative spot.
meanings.sent3: The limitednesses of the elevator led to a funny situation of people squeezing in.
meanings.sent4: The limitednesses of the forest clearing made it feel like a small oasis in the vast woods.
meanings.sent5: The limitednesses of the classroom made it cozy yet slightly cramped.
